trans-unit.source: Allows coordination of initialization for a component and its dependent properties.
trans-unit.target: Möjliggör samordning för initiering av en komponent och dess beroende egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: You should implement this interface when your component has initialization dependencies on other components that also implement the ISupportInitializeNotification interface.
trans-unit.target: Du måste implementera gränssnittet när komponenten har initiering beroenden på andra komponenter som implementerar gränssnittet ISupportInitializeNotification också.

trans-unit.source: You can check to see if the dependent components have completed initialization by checking the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollera om beroende komponenter har slutfört initiering genom att kontrollera den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A>

trans-unit.source: ISupportInitializeNotification is implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> types.
Occurs when initialization of the component is completed.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när initieringen av komponenten har slutförts.

trans-unit.source: This event typically occurs during the call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A> method for the component, but it may occur later if the component has dependent controls that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> interface and the dependent controls have not completed initialization.
trans-unit.target: Den här händelsen inträffar vanligen under anrop till den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A>metod för komponenten men det kan uppstå senare om komponenten har beroende kontroller som implementerar det <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification>gränssnitt och beroende kontroller har inte slutfört initiering.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du hanterar händelser finns [NIB: förbrukar händelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the component is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om komponenten har initierats.

trans-unit.source: The IsInitialized property is automatically set to `false` when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit%2A> method is called, and `true` when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsInitialized anges automatiskt `false` när den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit%2A>metoden anropas och `true` när den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A>metoden anropas.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the component has completed initialization; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>att ange komponenten har slutfört initiering; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
